@package ghc-toolkit
@version 0.0.1

module Language.Haskell.GHC.Toolkit.BuildInfo
bootLibsPath :: FilePath
ghcLibDir :: FilePath

module Language.Haskell.GHC.Toolkit.Compiler
data HaskellIR
HaskellIR :: HsParsedModule -> TcGblEnv -> CgGuts -> [StgTopBinding] -> [CmmDecl] -> [RawCmmDecl] -> HaskellIR
[$sel:parsed:HaskellIR] :: HaskellIR -> HsParsedModule
[$sel:typeChecked:HaskellIR] :: HaskellIR -> TcGblEnv
[$sel:core:HaskellIR] :: HaskellIR -> CgGuts
[$sel:stg:HaskellIR] :: HaskellIR -> [StgTopBinding]
[$sel:cmm:HaskellIR] :: HaskellIR -> [CmmDecl]
[$sel:cmmRaw:HaskellIR] :: HaskellIR -> [RawCmmDecl]
data CmmIR
CmmIR :: [CmmDecl] -> [RawCmmDecl] -> CmmIR
[$sel:cmm:CmmIR] :: CmmIR -> [CmmDecl]
[$sel:cmmRaw:CmmIR] :: CmmIR -> [RawCmmDecl]
data Compiler
($sel:patch:Compiler) :: Compiler -> ModSummary -> HsParsedModule -> Hsc HsParsedModule
($sel:withHaskellIR:Compiler) :: Compiler -> ModSummary -> HaskellIR -> CompPipeline ()
($sel:withCmmIR:Compiler) :: Compiler -> CmmIR -> CompPipeline ()
($sel:finalize:Compiler) :: Compiler -> Ghc ()
defaultCompiler :: Compiler

[pluginModuleName, pluginPackageName] :: FakeGHCOptions -> String

module Language.Haskell.GHC.Toolkit.GenPaths
data GenPathsOptions
GenPathsOptions :: String -> [String] -> GenPathsOptions
[targetModuleName] :: GenPathsOptions -> String
[extraPrograms] :: GenPathsOptions -> [String]
genPaths :: GenPathsOptions -> UserHooks -> UserHooks

module Language.Haskell.GHC.Toolkit.Hooks

module Language.Haskell.GHC.Toolkit.FrontendPlugin

module Language.Haskell.GHC.Toolkit.Orphans.Data
instance Data.Data.Data occ => Data.Data.Data (StgSyn.GenStgArg occ)
instance Data.Data.Data CmmType.Width
instance Data.Data.Data PrimOp.PrimOpVecCat
instance Data.Data.Data PrimOp.PrimOp
instance Data.Data.Data PrimOp.PrimCall
instance Data.Data.Data ForeignCall.CCallSpec
instance Data.Data.Data ForeignCall.ForeignCall
instance Data.Data.Data StgSyn.StgOp
instance Data.Data.Data TyCon.PrimElemRep
instance Data.Data.Data TyCon.PrimRep
instance Data.Data.Data StgSyn.AltType
instance (Data.Data.Data bndr, Data.Data.Data occ) => Data.Data.Data (StgSyn.GenStgExpr bndr occ)
instance Data.Data.Data StgSyn.UpdateFlag
instance (Data.Data.Data bndr, Data.Data.Data occ) => Data.Data.Data (StgSyn.GenStgRhs bndr occ)
instance (Data.Data.Data bndr, Data.Data.Data occ) => Data.Data.Data (StgSyn.GenStgBinding bndr occ)
instance (Data.Data.Data bndr, Data.Data.Data occ) => Data.Data.Data (StgSyn.GenStgTopBinding bndr occ)
instance Data.Data.Data CmmExpr.VGcPtr
instance Data.Data.Data CmmExpr.GlobalReg
instance Data.Data.Data Cmm.SectionType
instance Data.Data.Data Cmm.Section

instance Data.Data.Data Unique.Unique
instance Data.Data.Data StgSyn.StgBinderInfo
instance Data.Data.Data CostCentre.CostCentreStack
instance Data.Data.Data CLabel.CLabel

module Language.Haskell.GHC.Toolkit.Run
data Config
ghcFlags :: Config -> [String]
ghcLibDir :: Config -> FilePath
defaultConfig :: Config
runHaskell :: MonadIO m => Config -> [String] -> m (Map Module HaskellIR)
runSingleHaskell :: MonadIO m => Config -> String -> m (Module, HaskellIR)
runCmm :: MonadIO m => Config -> [FilePath] -> m (Map FilePath CmmIR)
